titles.title: A resolution recognizing the importance of sun safety, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 6/9/2005--Passed Senate without amendment. Recognizes the importance of sun safety and the need for school-based safety education programs. Encourages all American to protect themselves and their children from the dangers of excessive sun exposure. Congratulates the Sun Safety Alliance for its efforts to promote sun safety and prevent skin cancer. Expresses support for the goals and ideas of National Sun Safety Week (June 5-June 11, 2005).
